entries.text: The outbreak started. People are turning into zombies. The city is in chaos.
I found an old bunker, but supplies are low. The infected roam the streets.
Zombies attacked last night. We barely escaped. We need weapons and a better plan.
Rumors of a safe zone near the hills. Must find a way to escape.
We lost two members to a bite. Infection spreads fast. No cure in sight.
The bunker was compromised. Nowhere is safe. We keep moving. Stay quiet, stay alive.
